item.description:
It's almost Valentine's Day! Let's go to the movies.

Hugo has been nominated for 11 Academy Awards, and I want to see it on the big screen while I still can. I hear it's a valentine to moviemaking of years gone by, too. We can't miss!

I will purchase my ticket at about 3:30 p.m., then wait in the theater lobby, across from the concession stand, for about 15 minutes. Look for me and my red backpack. At 3:45, I will move into the theater auditorium (we want to be able to find seats, and I don't want to miss the previews). You can find me in the theater auditorium if you are late. The movie starts at 4:15 p.m.

After the movie, I will wait in the theater lobby to gather everyone. Look for the red backpack.

If we decide to go out in Harvard Square (for chocolate dessert?!) after the movie, be prepared to add 25% to the cost of your order for both the tax and the tip. Bring cash to make division of the check easier.

Please RSVP if you plan to attend this event.

Marianne
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me and my red backpack. See the event description for more details.
item.name: Hugo (second chance to see this Oscar-nominated movie)
